text: views. 14.37 Tall buildings house large numbers of people and can support a range of activities, including the provision of amenity areas (e.g. private, communal and public spaces) and active uses. In the majority of cases, tall buildings are communities in their own right given the number of inhabitants they have. In relation to part 5(i), where they are residential, tall buildings should deliver appropriate quantities of high-quality amenity and play space for tenants and occupants.
